question_text: Select two features commonly found in always-on VPN configurations:
answer_options: The connection starts automatically at device login
Manual user activation is required every session
Encryption of all network traffic by default
Requires physical tokens for every packet
correct_answer: The connection starts automatically at device login
Encryption of all network traffic by default
explanation: Always-on VPNs start without user intervention and encrypt all data by default for continuous security.
